name: Medieval Jewels Switch
description:
The most exciting match three quest game is here! Play Medieval Jewel Match Quest, an epic crusade to win a war against evil force.

This match 3 game has HD quality graphic and over 300 levels to conquer. Swipe to make the jewels disappear from the board. Practice your spell-craft in a magic match three game. It’s truly a step above other similar game that will bewitched you from start to finish.

Medieval era is an era that fascinates us, from the story of the King Arthur who ruled a powerful kingdom, Camelot, Merlin, and other knights. You will also find stories about dragons and magic that bewitch you. We often find games with themes like the crusade, clash between royal bloods, and warriors. We also love various match three games because they are so addictive. This is why we created Medieval Jewel Match Quest, a legendary hero saga where you can play match 3 game while exploring the story of magical kingdom in medieval ear. You can play and join in the crusade, clash with other kingdoms, and more. Read more to find out all features in this match three kingdom game.

*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*
TOP FEATURES OF MEDIEVAL JEWEL MATCH QUEST:
*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*

- EPIC MAGIC MATCH THREE QUEST
In this match three kingdom, everything is epic. The storyline and the game-play are very addictive. There are over 300 levels to conquer so you will enjoy many hours of playing. Our match three kingdom game is also very re-playable. After you've finished all the levels in our game, you will have fun replay them again for higher score and achievements.

- HD graphic and fantastic sounds
We painstakingly create the best graphic for you. You can fully immerse yourself in a beautiful medieval world. Ever wonder what the house or the knights in this area looks like? Or maybe you often dream of visiting the historic kingdom of Camelot and Arthur or join in their holy crusade?

- SIMPLE TO PLAY BUT CHALLENGING

In the earlier levels, you might find the game very easy, especially if you often play match 3 games. You might think some mini warriors can beat them. However, not everything is smooth sailing for you. Just like being a knight or warrior isn’t easy, conquering our match three quest isn't as easy as you think. We have added challenges for every level to keep you engaged in this game.

Sometimes you need to try to play several times before you can beat a level.
So, are you ready to play and immerse yourself in our epic magic match three kingdom? Just download our game and play now! Don’t be left out of the story of the clash between the royals. Be the ultimate dynasty warrior and king!
---
If you encounter any problem when you play Medieval Jewel Magic Match game, please don’t hesitate to contact us via email. We will resolve the issue as soon as possible.

If you enjoy this game, please share it to your friends and family so they can have fun joining in the crusade in this magic match 3 game. We also appreciate it if you can leave a rating and review for our game so we can keep creating awesome games for you!
